Title: 41094 - How to Use Your Cellphone as a Professional Camera
Direction: 675 words. Explain that for the longest time people have been carrying both a cellphone and a camera because taking pictures on a cellphone did not deliver professional results. Then, list 4-8 improvements in cellphone technology that make professional photography possible. Listing some apps that filter and adjust images would also be appropriate. Highlight the Samsung Galaxy S7 Edge and it's dual-pixel feature so you can incorporate the client link naturally. Your audience is tech savvy individuals who also know a lot about photography.
Anchor Text: samsung galaxy s7 edge branded term (brand/client name)
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: the Samsung Galaxy S7 Edge's 12MP camera

Title: 41099 - # Things You Didn't Know Marshmallow Could Do
Direction: 675 words. Many people have updated to Marshmallow on their Android devices, but they may not know all the great features the operating system offers. Title: 41101 - Hacking a Job Search When You Don't Feel Qualified
Direction: 675 words. Looking for jobs is hard, especially when you don't feel like your previous jobs or degree have prepared you for the job you want. Your audience is millennial women who are interested in changing jobs or starting a new career.
